howItWorks.question: How does real-time tracking work?
howItWorks.answer: Our buses are equipped with GPS devices that send location data every 10 seconds. This information is processed and displayed on our interactive map.

accuracy.question: How accurate are the arrival times?
accuracy.answer: Our ETA predictions are typically accurate within 2-3 minutes, taking into account real traffic conditions and historical data.

coverage.question: Which routes are covered?
coverage.answer: We currently cover all major bus routes in the city. Check our route map for detailed coverage information.
